projects.title: LeafBank
projects.shortdesc: An iOS Application for logging and surveying medical usage to aid in the research of cannabis
projects.description: This app was created with a team of 5 for a class called 'iProgramming for Creative Minds'. In the class we were given the chance to build apps for real clients with regular meetings and deadlines. The objective of this app was to survey and log medication usage to be used for research. This class taught me many skills including programming in Swift, prototyping in Sketch and InVision, and designing an effective User Experience for the client

projects.title: MatrixVision
projects.shortdesc: A Web Application that takes a users webcam video and manipulates the pixels to create a matrix-like filter
projects.description: Originally this was a final project I did for an Art class on Net Art, done entirely in javascript. But I decided to exercise my newly gained knowledge and convert it to a React application. In doing so I learned how to split up a project into components and the React lifecycle

projects.title: Critix
projects.shortdesc: A Web Application that allows photographers and digital illustrators to share and critic works of other content creators
projects.description: This application was created with a team of 4. Critix is an image hosting application, similar to Instagram, designed for a specific kind of audience: creators who are looking for constructive criticism about their works. Users could upload images as well as comment on others posts in real time. And we created this all in one week!
projects.technologies: Embedded JavaScript, HTML5, Materialize CSS, MongoDB + Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js

projects.title: Library Kiosk Application
projects.shortdesc: A Windows Application to replace the current outdated systems libraries use today.
projects.description: This application was created by me and 3 others in a Human-Computer Interactions course.

projects.title: Import Car Database
projects.shortdesc: A database designed and implemented from scratch
